data.message: I write because I know the world will be a better place with this series in every home library. Woman should be spiritually referenced for their divinity. It'a my opinion that they should occupy every seat of all power. There'a new series that has fun with this very premise. Check your Amazon app tomorrow for these titles. They're only two out of an expected ten parts to an exciting series for women of all ages titled "A GODDESS AMONGST US".
